item.description:
Admin controls for adjusting profit rates

Adjustment Types:
- Global: Affects ALL investments
- User: All investments of specific user
- Investment: Specific single investment
- Plan: All investments in a plan

Adjustment Methods:
- Percentage: Set exact daily % (e.g., 15%)
- Fixed Amount: Set exact daily $ (e.g., $500/day)
- Multiplier: Multiply normal profit (e.g., 1.5Ã— or 2Ã—)

NEW: Daily profit distribution system with admin controls

Features:
- Automatic daily profit distribution (runs at midnight)
- Admin can adjust profit rates
- Pause/resume investments
- Manual bonus payments
- Complete audit trail
